title: Cozy futurism
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: The article explores the concept of "cozy futurism," contrasting it with a "cool-shit futurism" focused on space exploration and advanced technology.  It argues that seemingly "easier" problems like homelessness and healthcare are often overlooked in favor of technologically ambitious projects, despite their immediate and crucial importance.
